DisciplineAndPunish.name: Discipline and Punish
DisciplineAndPunish.effect: can build watchtower once during stage

SoftBrain.name: Softy Puffy Brain
SoftBrain.effect: Can replace one command per phase

IntroductionToBusiness.name: Introduction to Business
IntroductionToBusiness.description: The person who does work well is the one who hires the person who works well.
IntroductionToBusiness.effect: The soldier with the highest rank is forced to appear in each phase, and then does not appear in the same stage

Supernanny.name: Supernanny
Supernanny.effect: The temptation of the soldier with the lowest rank is 0%

EngelCoefficient.name: Engel's Coefficient
EngelCoefficient.effect: In the preparation phase, the speed of the soldiers in the corresponding action phase is +n*10% for the cost left.

MiracleMemorizationMethod.name: Miracle Memorization Method
MiracleMemorizationMethod.effect: Number of commands possessed +1 per phase

WealthTheory.name: Wealth Theory
WealthTheory.effect: Money earned when clearing a quest +20%

CapitalTheory.name: Capital Theory
CapitalTheory.effect: Money earned when clearing a stage +20%

NicomacheanEthics.name: Nicomachean Ethics
NicomacheanEthics.effect: The more rations, the temptation of the soldiers -n%
